pullrequest.title: added more controller configurations.  implement/fix dynamic add / remove screw joint between coupling and standpipe via fire hose plugin.  Added door controller.

content.raw: In `DRCFirehosePlugin::AddJoint()`, does the code for setting the thread pitch on the joint only work with Gazebo 1.3.x?  If so, then we need to discuss the two release schedules and version compatibilities.
content.html: In DRCFirehosePlugin::AddJoint(), does the code for setting the thread pitch on the joint only work with Gazebo 1.3.x? If so, then we need to discuss the two release schedules and version compatibilities.
